comment.author: 70224721@N03
comment._content: We like your photos and would like to invite you to submit one or more of them on the TOP website. TOP – Today One Photo is an association with a simple idea, every day the best submitted photo, showcased on our website: tophoto.org Thank you in advance.

comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Watching the Video of this sad, sad young mans ordeal in Norway was just very sad.  The Video shows so much on how these Poor Prisoners hung onto life.  When they left Norway and the damned Germans were defeated the Prisoners went back to their Homeland, only to be put in Prison by Stalin.   It was so sad to see,  Norway was invaded by the damned Germans.  The Norwegian People did all they could to help the Poor Prisoners.   So sad.     Norway and all it's People did what they could to help.   God Bless Norway and your Video showed me horror that most People don't know about.    It also showed me how Norway did all they could to help the Suffering.
